snippet: The police said an officer shot and killed a man after a two-hour standoff on Tuesday at a central Florida home.
abstract: Palm Bay, Fla, police officer fatally shoots armed man following two-hour standoff; man, who remains unidentified, had been reportedly threatening construction workers at neighboring house.
lead_paragraph: The police said an officer shot and killed a man after a two-hour standoff on Tuesday at a central Florida home.

headline.main: Florida: Man Is Killed in Standoff With Police
